tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a panic caused by an index out-of-bounds error in the `parse` method when the input ends with a `$` character. This can lead to unexpected application crashes when processing malformed or specially crafted input.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges and using template::UriTemplateStr.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `subst` library to the patch version.
